name: SuitCSS Selector
description: SuitCSS selector detection for use in scss-lint
content:
someComponent
someComponent-good
someComponent-good.is-something
someComponent-good--good
someComponent-goodCase--good
someComponent--good
someComponent--goodCase
u-width-2-5
u-width-1-10
h1
h2
h6
something-somethingElse-anotherThing--bigThing




SomeComponent-case
someComponent-good.has-something
someComponent--GoodCase
someComponent-BoodCase--good
someComponent__Sing
someComponent--female__hand
SomeComponent
author: Simon Taggart
